page.title: 16Cornish Dialect
page.content: It is difficult to find anyone in the area who can speak the Cornish language. Some expressions are listed below but the spellings of some words are doubtful. {'e be misting} it is raining lightly {'e be 'ansome} it is fine,excellent {where's it to? } where is it? {'ow be doing?} how are you? {looking a bit wished} tired,unwell {mazed as a curly} very angry {like Lanson(Launceston) gaol}v.untidy {like a crab goin' gaol} very slowly {pigs' teddies} very small potatoes {thunder and lightning} treacle and cream on bread {jowdle ) { )}potato:chipped,small, {raw teddy fry ) }fried {emmetts}- tourists {oggy - }pasty {chi'l(cheel) -} children
